job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Rabobank, you will take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.

   You will join Tribe Digital Platform (DP)
   which is the driving force behind excellent customer experiences. DP ensures safe online access for all our digital interactions, and develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking, all from one single platform.

   Within the Tribe, there is the Area Rabo Business Banking (RBB) - which ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands. With Rabo Business Banking, we provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.

   You will be joining a team in the area RBB that focuses on "Insights features"
   which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.

   Are you an engineer who goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities? Do you have a passion for solving problems, taking responsibility, challenging your colleagues, and ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers? If so, we want to hear from you!, Rabobank has fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable. You will be asked to have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.
job_details.full_text:
Senior backend engineer

At Rabobank, you will take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.

   You will join Tribe Digital Platform (DP)
   which is the driving force behind excellent customer experiences. DP ensures safe online access for all our digital interactions, and develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking, all from one single platform.

   Within the Tribe, there is the Area Rabo Business Banking (RBB) - which ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands. With Rabo Business Banking, we provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.

   You will be joining a team in the area RBB that focuses on "Insights features"
   which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.

   Are you an engineer who goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities? Do you have a passion for solving problems, taking responsibility, challenging your colleagues, and ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers? If so, we want to hear from you!, Rabobank has fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable. You will be asked to have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering and DevOps responsibilities within a banking context. While it mentions 'insights features' and 'personalized insights', there is no explicit mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it not a fit for ML or GenAI Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.phrase: take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in the full spectrum of software development, from initial conception through to deployment and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the core responsibility of building and maintaining user-facing applications and platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: focuses on "Insights features" which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of features that provide value and information to clients, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities
job_tasks.justification: This implies a broader scope of software engineering responsibilities beyond just writing code.

job_tasks.phrase: fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications. But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps responsibilities, including deployment, maintenance, and stability of applications.

job_tasks.phrase: have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates on-call responsibilities for maintaining the operational stability of the applications, a common aspect of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the strategic business ambition for the product, requiring an understanding of the market and customer needs.

job_tasks.phrase: provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.
job_tasks.justification: This outlines the business value proposition and user experience goals for the product.

job_tasks.phrase: provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.
job_tasks.justification: This details the business purpose of the 'Insights features' and their benefit to clients.

soft_skills.justification: Directly states a passion for problem-solving.
Indicates a proactive approach and ownership of tasks and outcomes.
Suggests active engagement and constructive feedback within a team, implying collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers
soft_skills.justification: Demonstrates a commitment to quality and taking ownership of the team's output.

soft_skills.phrase: goes beyond just coding and creating new functionalities
soft_skills.justification: Implies a willingness to engage with aspects of the role beyond basic coding, suggesting adaptability and a broader skillset.
